shri lanka - dakunu aprika kantha wissayi20 tharagawaliye palamu tharagaya ada perawaru 10.00ta kolts pitiye di aarambha wana athara dewani tharagaya anidda (25) perawaruwe kolts pitiyedima pawathwe.awasan tharagaya labana 26da paswaru 1.30ta welenda sewa krikat pitiye di pawathwimata niyamithaya.wissayi20 tharagawaliyata nam kala shri lanka kandayama- chamari athapaththu (nayika), prasadini wirakkodi, yasodha mendis, shashikala siriwardhana, hasini perera, ishani lokusuriya, ama kanchana, nilakshi silwa, madhuri samuddika, inoka ranawira, inoshi pranandu, imalka mendis, udeshika prabodhani, anushka sanjiwani.athireka kridikawan - chandima gunarathna, shripali wirakkodi, chamari polgampola, sanduni abewikrama.

prajathanthrawadaya aaraksha kirima, manawa himikam aaraksha kirima, jathyanthara samaya saha aarakshawa thahawuru kirima, wiruddha matha iwasima saha ekineka athara awabodhaya, adahas prakasha kirime nidahasa athi kirima, balathala beda ganima, nithiye aadhipathyaya thahawuru kirima, yahapalanaya athi kirima, thirasara sanwardhanaya, parisaraya aaraksha kirima, saukhya adhyapanaya aahara niwasa sandaha athi ayithiya thahawuru kirima, sthri purusha samanathmathawaya, podu rajya mandaliya tharuna tharuniyange wadagathkama piliganima, kuda rajyayan piliganima, awadanamata lakwi athi rajyayange awashyatha piliganima saha siwil samajaye karyabharaya piliganima me podu rajya nayaka samuluwe muladharma wanawa.
